Package com.olegermolaev84.archive.core

Class Coder

java.lang.Object
com.olegermolaev84.archive.core.Codec
com.olegermolaev84.archive.core.Coder
public class Coder
extends Codec
Compresses and packs denoted files and directories into the denoted OutputStream

  • Constructor Details

    • Coder

      public Coder​(java.lang.String[] pathNames, java.io.OutputStream os) throws java.io.IOException
      Constructor.
      Parameters:
      pathNames - Array of files and directories' names to the archived.
      os - Output stream the archived data to be written to
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - will be thrown in case of IO errors

  • Method Details

    • setCompressionLevel

      public void setCompressionLevel​(int compressionLevel) throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
      Sets the compression level. Value is to be in range 0-9.
      Parameters:
      compressionLevel - Compression level. Value from 0 to 9
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - will be thrown is the denoted compression level less then 0 or more then 9.

    • checkFiles

      private boolean checkFiles()
      Checks each file from the denoted directories and files. Each file should exist, have read permissions and the size of file should not exceed 2Gb
      Returns:
      true if all tests are passed, otherwise false

    • pack

      public boolean pack() throws java.io.IOException
      Packs files into the archive.
      Returns:
      true if archiving is performed successfully, otherwise false
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - will be thrown in case of IO errors

    • shutdown

      protected boolean shutdown​(boolean result) throws java.io.IOException
      Description copied from class: Codec
      Shutdowns executor and closes streams
      Specified by:
      shutdown in class Codec
      Parameters:
      result - the result to be returned by this method
      Returns:
      result
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - will be thrown in case of IO exceptions

    • submitTask

      private void submitTask​(java.nio.file.Path path, java.util.concurrent.ExecutorCompletionService<SingleFileCoder> service, java.lang.StringBuffer errors)
      Creates new Callable task for the given path. The task is responsible for packing the denoted file. Then the task is submitted into the ExecutorCompletionService
      Parameters:
      path - file or directory to be packed
      service - ExecutorCompletionService
      errors - StringBuffer to collect error which can occur while the file packing.

    • writeCompressedData

      private void writeCompressedData​(SingleFileCoder coder) throws java.io.IOException
      Writes PathHeader and compressed data of the file into the output stream. The method is called for each Callable task when it is completed.
      Parameters:
      coder - SingleFileCoder which already has compressed file's data
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - will be thrown if some IO error occurred while the data is being written to the output stream
